17 STATEMENT No. 1 -Continued Sin addition to the foregoing the following appropriations are made: the several state institutions of Nebraska payable from the institutional funds in the state treasurer's office, all money now on hand belonging ch such institution from its institutional cash fund and all moneys received the sale of property or from other sources by the several superintendents ch institutions from April 1, 1913 to April 1, 1915, which money shall be into the state treasury according to law. For the purpose of maintaining the state fire department and the paying the expense incident thereto, all moneys now on hand belonging to the special fund for the maintenance of said department and all moneys that may be paid into said fund prior to April 1, 1915, the same to be deposited monthly with the state treasurer and by him disbursed according to law. For the Nebraska Stallion Registration Board all fees for inspections and transfers of stallions and jacks received during the biennium ending March 31, 1915, and all fees in said fund on hand March 31, 1913, are hereby appro - priated to cover the expenses 3306x6 Cobbey's Annotated Statutes for 1911. I ? ot the State Insurance Board there is hereby approrpiated so much of es paid for examination of insurance companies and expenses of examiners r ed during the biennium ending March 31, 1915, under Senate File No. Nebraska Legislative Session of 1913, as may be required to cover the ises of regular examiners and the per diem and expenses of special exam - acting under the State Insurance Board. For the Food, Drug and Dairy Commission, all fees collected under the Pure Seed and Commercial Stock Food Law during the biennium ending K31, 1915, also all fees in said fund on hand March 31, 1913 are hereby riated to cover the expenses of this department in accordance with 3086, of Cobbey's Annotated Statutes for 1911.
